title.narrative: African Wildlife Forensics Network – capacity and coordination for law enforcement

description.narrative: This project aims to address the disparity between arrests and convictions in the prosecution of IWT-related crimes in the eight African target countries through the establishment of a wildlife forensic network. This project will support the development of a laboratory network, whereby countries with core DNA forensic laboratories will service satellite units in neighbouring countries.
